LanguageData.CoreNarrativeDesc: The core narrative of your ideoligion. This has no gameplay impact.
LanguageData.LockButtonDesc: Clicking this button toggles a lock the current ideoligion narrative. When locked, the narrative text will not auto-regenerate if the ideoligion is changed.
LanguageData.LockInOn: Narrative lock is currently on. The narrative will not auto-regenerate.
LanguageData.LockInOff: Narrative lock is currently off. The narrative text can auto-regenerate.
LanguageData.CultureTip: Culture affects names, appearances, and symbols.
LanguageData.StructureMemeTip: An ideoligion's structure determines the kind of entities and forces it sees as important to the moral structure of the universe. It has no direct gameplay effects.
LanguageData.RandomizeSymbolsTooltip: Randomize ideoligion name, icon, narrative, leader title and any other texts like ritual names or role names. This does not affect gameplay elements like memes or precepts.
LanguageData.ClickAnyElementToEditIt: Click any element to edit it
LanguageData.Name: Name
LanguageData.IdeoCharityQuestInfo: This is a charity quest. If you don't fulfill it, believers in {0} will be unhappy due to their charitable beliefs. If you do, believers in {0} will be happy ({1}).
LanguageData.WorkDisabledSlave: Slaves will not do this work
LanguageData.CharityQuestTip: This is a charity quest. People with charitable beliefs will be affected by its outcome.
LanguageData.RelicTip: Relics are objects of spiritual or ideological significance. They can be discovered by completing long and dangerous quests. A relic can be installed in a reliquary to attract pilgrims, enhance rituals, and strengthen an ideoligion's ability to convert outsiders.
LanguageData.IdeoImpactOverallDesc: Some memes impact gameplay more than others. The meme's impact score gives a sense of how big of a gameplay impact it has.
LanguageData.ResearchProjectHasDefsWithMissingMemes: {0} unlocks things which you cannot build because they require memes that none of your people believe
LanguageData.SelectedWorkTypeOpposedByIdeo: Warning: This kind of work is opposed by {0_possessive} ideoligion, so it may make this person unhappy.
